message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1100000. This is a steal, considering its true value to me is at least $1200000. I'm willing to make a concession for you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
